"Acabo de terminar el juego y sinceramente a mi no me encantó, no se por que, será por mis gustos personales pero no me llamó muchísimo la atención.Aun así lo recomiendo ¿porque? Por que el juego objetivamente si es un buen juego y en ciertos momentos específicos se nota que los desarrolladores hicieron el juego con ganas y pasión y no solo para llenarse los bolsillos." Esto es parte de la reseña que deje en la segunda entrega de este juego, y de la primera pienso lo mismo, buen juego en cuanto a la jugabilidad y para el tiempo jugable que ofrece, también posee lindos detalles así que lo recomiendo, tanto la primera como la segunda entrega.

There's literally not a single reason why you shouldn't play portal. I would recommend this game to every person i know going from my friends to my grandma. It's logical, it's fun, it's going to run smooth on your pc, it's an absolute classic and made for literally all audiences ever. Have you ever talked to somebody who played this game and hated it? I highly doubt it. Just play it, there's no reason not to.

Obviously this game is classic and for all the right reasons. I played this game pretty quickly and enjoyed every second. The gameplay at the time I'm sure was very different and even as someone going into the game blind, it still aged very well. The dark humor was also enjoyable as well. 

Does it hold up as a game that will stay in my memory for a while? Perhaps, but it was also quite short and lacked much of a story. Despite this, what it did give as a story was sufficient for the game and still piques my interest for the next installment. Overall, if I had to rate the game, I would give it 3.75 out of 5 stars. The best parts of the game are the gameplay and graphics (which still hold up well). The only disappointment is the story because of so much that is left unanswered. 

Oh and I also love the cake. 
Even if it was a lie...

Portal - я бы эту игру назвал глотком свежего воздуха. Честно говоря, я не ожидал, что она оставит так много хороших впечатлений. Взял просто комплект из первой и второй части за смешную цену, в надежде, что смогу поиграть в неё с другом. Но как только я начал проходить уровни, меня затянуло и часы пролетали не заметно. Пусть эта игра и представляет из себя результат тестирования своих возможностей, но она получилась, и получилась на славу.
Это всеми любимая игра, мне вообще что-то сюда надо писать?
Proč jsou ty achievmenty tak těžký :(

curto e não tão desafiador como o segundo (até pq esse foi o "teste" pro estilo do jogo), porém, ainda assim vale a pena ser jogado
